name: Lumox Studio
description: Lumox Studio focuses on providing games in the Play to Earn range. Lumox Land is a game designed around the most popular MEME tokens, where users can choose 1 of 4 characters in multiplayer mode. Matches allow users to earn points to rank the best players, and soon the points will be exchangeable for LUMOX tokens. There are 2 more MMORPG and FIGHT game launches planned for this year, released by developers Lumox Studio. The Studio itself also recommends other games from our partners.
